Working on a SaaS Boilerplate project with Igniter.js framework and Next.js 15.5.3.

Project Stack:

- Next.js 15.5.3 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- Shadcn/ui component library
- Igniter.js for API framework
- Prisma for database (to be implemented)
- React 18.3.1

Project Structure:

- Using App Router pattern (/app directory)
- Components organized by page-specific vs generic
- MCP Server tools available (@igniter-js/mcp-server)
- Design system with CSS variables and Tailwind extensions

Current Focus:

- Dashboard page at /dashboard-vendas
- Data visualization with charts and tables
- Responsive design with mobile considerations
- Clean separation of dev/prod environments

Development Server:

- Running on port 3000
- Hot reload working
- Fast Refresh enabled

Key Files:

- /src/app/dashboard-vendas/page.tsx (main dashboard)
- /src/modules/dashboard/data/data-fetchers.ts (data logic)
- /src/mocks/\* (development data)
- globals.css and tailwind.config.ts (styling)
